name: UNEQUIP
description:
UNEQUIP is a Gladiatorial Arena Action-Arcade Game, where weapon selection and inventory management is key.

You play as a gladiator whose sole mission is to survive, as you fight for your life against the waves of enemies being thrown at you.

Can you beat it?

Play it for free now on GAMEJOLT and ITCH.IO!

Controls:

  • Left click for melee attack
  • Right Click for throw or block
  • WASD to move
  • Hold space to view inventory

Features:

  • Randomly generated waves
  • Simple combat
  • Two different weapon classes
  • Spear throwing
  • Shield parrying
  • Different enemy types

Price: Free

Platforms: PC

Contact: patrickmansonschool@gmail.com

Created by Patrick Manson for Media Design School
